      • setAccelsEnabled

        public void setAccelsEnabled(java.util.ArrayList<javax.swing.KeyStroke> keys,
                             boolean enabled)
        Removes/replaces the accel key binding for toolbar/menu actions if they key matches one given. If true is passed for enabled, 'keys' is not checked and may be null
        Parameters:
        keys - KeyStrokes to remove as accelerators
        enabled - disable or enable accelerator functionality

      • getLabelFromHashtable

        private java.lang.String getLabelFromHashtable(java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,int[]> h)
        For use with BrowserWindow.getCurrentIndices() hashtable should have exactly one entry if non-null. This returns null if the hashtable is null, or the single key (label) if non-null

      • printLabels

        public java.lang.String printLabels()
        Return a string representation of all labels and the associated card information for each. No dependencies; for development only
